instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2879 liquid damage, no backlight
threads.message:
Hi,

got this macbook with no backlight. LVDS connector around ppvout_sw_lcdbklt pins was totally burned. Replaced the connector, got backlight back but no image. Mac is working fine with external monitor via displayport. Also tried another good display, no image still. What to measure?

threads.title: 820-2879 liquid damage, no backlight
threads.message: White screen or dark screen with backlight present?

threads.title: 820-2879 liquid damage, no backlight
threads.message: No 3V to LCD so either dead L9004 or dead U9000.
